attributes.action: Allow  home educators to be free from the interference of Local Education Authorities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As home educators we believe our children thrive without the constraints of rigid schooling and national curriculum. We have, for many years faced unfair scrutiny from the education authorities and social services. We beleive the way we educate our children is the best for our children.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow home educators to be free from the interference of Local Education Authorities."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11289.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HErights/
